definition: germ layer/layer of tissue in embryology

sentences.english: In the center layer (mesoderm), the heart and circulatory system are forming.
sentences.chinese: 在中胚层，心脏和循环系统正在形成。

sentences.english: Fibroblasts are mesenchymal cells which are derived from the embryonic mesoderm.
sentences.chinese: 成纤维细胞是胚胎中胚层起源的间叶细胞。

sentences.english: Fibroblasts are mesenchymal cells, which are derived from the embryonic mesoderm.
sentences.chinese: 成纤维细胞是来源于胚胎中胚层的间充质细胞。

sentences.english: The fore-gut and hind-gut are of ectodermal origin and the mid-gut arises from endoderm.
sentences.chinese: 前肠与后肠起源于外胚层，中肠则发生自内胚层。

sentences.english: The fore-gut and hind-gut are of ectodermal origin and the mid-gut arises from endoderm.
sentences.chinese: 前肠与后肠起源于外胚层，中肠则发生自内胚层。

sentences.english: The results showed:At gastrula stage, the cells in front of the embryonic area gradually cleave to form optic disc rudiment.
sentences.chinese: 在原肠期，胚区前端的外胚层细胞增殖形成视叶原基。

sentences.english: Embryology The splitting of the blastoderm into two layers of cells to form a gastrula.
sentences.chinese: 指囊胚层分裂两个细胞层，形成一个原肠胚。

sentences.english: The jaw teeth and pharyngeal teeth are derived from the ectoderm and mesoderm.
sentences.chinese: 南方鲶的颌齿均由外胚层及中胚层分化而成。

sentences.english: The jaw teeth and pharyngeal teeth are derived from the ectoderm and mesoderm.
sentences.chinese: 南方鲶的颌齿均由外胚层及中胚层分化而成。

sentences.english: They are bilateral symmetrical animals with a triploblastic body plan.
sentences.chinese: 它们是三胚层体制的两侧对称。

sentences.english: The final diagnosis was Congenital Mesoblastic Nephroma .
sentences.chinese: 最终诊断为先天性中胚层肾瘤。

definition: trophoblastic layer (attaches fertilized ovum to the uterus)/trophoderm
